items.title: I'm a film student and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in being inâ€¦
items.summary:
I'm a film student and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in being involved in my projects this year. I'm creating a trailer this term, a news segment next term, and a final movie at the end of the year. 

The trailer I'm working on right now is about the Welsh Princess Gwenllian Ferch Grufydd, the historical Hero Warrior from Deheubarth. I will supply all props and equipment for each project, and I even have a makeup artist on standby (my sister, she's a professional, worked on movies and in the west end). For this project I just need one girl or woman to play Gwenllian preparing for battle to take on the Norman army. 

I can't pay anyone who agrees to take part, I'm sorry, but I will provide copies of each final project to anyone who takes part so they can put it in their portfolios. I even have a photographer involved in taking photographs of you in your for your portfolios as well. 

If this is something you would be open to discussing you can reach me on here anytime, or on the email 49616@bridgend.ac.uk or [daniella.burgess@hotmail.co.uk](mailto:daniella.burgess@hotmail.co.uk).

I'm studying at Pencoed Campus Bridgend College, but we'll be travelling all over Wales for the shoots. 

Hope to hear from you, Dani.

items.title:
Hello, Hello! 

We are looking for actors to join SONDER, a new theatre collectiâ€¦
items.summary:
Hello, Hello! 

We are looking for actors to join SONDER, a new theatre collective, for our debut production: Toasted.

One in three people will face redundancy at some point in their lives. No job is safe from the shifting tides of modern work. Toasted delves into corporate negligence, where employees become numbers, and entire livelihoods are erasedâ€”like an Excel spreadsheetâ€”overnight.

We are collaborating with Hotel Continental â€“ Art Space in Exile, where we have access to rehearsal spaces and a professional performance venue.

We are looking for Actors of all backgrounds who are eager to explore bold, collaborative and impactful storytelling. This is an unpaid, collective-driven project, with the aim of forming an ensemble that will continue beyond this production.

Project Period: May â€“ June 2025

If you are interested in getting involved, then email us at info.sondertheatrecollective@gmail.com by 22.04 with a few lines about yourself and what youâ€™d bring to the collective. We will follow up with audition dates, details, and more information about the production.

If you have any questions or are interested in assisting with the collective in other production roles, then please feel free to also get in touch.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

â€” The SONDER Team

An actor to play Jean

A stage manager https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdhFHYqyXtQdCFnees0aAhDHMbKPBflFe3H7mMGkyoXjaF_tQ/viewform

Stage Manager

I'm putting together a virtual table read for a web series I am working on with Gino Alfonso and we're still looking to fill the role for Tanisha. Below is the character description and link to the side!

TANISHA:  Bi-sexual alt-punk girl. Loves talking about pop culture and collecting anime trinkets for her desk area. She is also a major stoner. Loves talking about it and creating blunts or bongs either by hand or with gadgets to the point where she gets herself lost in her inventive machinations. She gets excited for conventions and enjoys making plans for them with the rest of the group. On her off time, she works to get funding to grow her own marijuana and sell it to medical dispensaries.

**CASTING CALL**

**Title:** CrimeCast (Episode 01A)

**Genre:** Dark Comedy, Crime Mystery, Episodic 

**Logline:** Emotionally unstable True Crime podcast host wants answers, but has to decide which is more important: her friends' and family's safety or the truth of what happened to her dead best friend.

**Roles:**

**Kendall Taylor**: (26, female, open ethnicity) Girlie-girl. Pink is her favorite color. Works on the podcast with Lucy and Jackie. Smart and a bit sassy. Kendall has been getting these scary, threatening letters on her car. She does not want to worry her friends, so she hasnâ€™t told anyone. She finally breaks and tells Jackie whatâ€™s happening.**  (Vibe: Think Elle from Legally Blonde, but less moneyed.)**

**Cheryl Armstrong: **(30s-50s, female, open ethnicity) Popular, longtime local morning show correspondent. A consummate professional. items.title:
Hi everyone,

We're producing a **paid social media campaign for Vantage Debt Maâ€¦
items.summary:
Hi everyone,

We're producing a **paid social media campaign for Vantage Debt Management** as part of our **Trust is Earned and Broken in Every Step** series, which highlights real South African stories of overcoming debt and regaining financial control.

We're looking for **two male candidates** who have gone through debt and successfully recovered, ideally with experience using **Debt Review**, but this is not required:
1. **Male aged 25â€“44**
2. **Male aged 45+**

**What the shoot involves:**
* **Payment:** R2,000 per person
* **Date:** To be confirmed
* **Location:** Salt River, Cape Town
* **Format:** Short testimonial-style video (scripted) sharing your story of overcoming debt, plus a few headshots and b-roll footage.
* **Usage:** Videos will appear on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and other social media platforms.

This campaign aims to **humanise debt solutions**, show that recovery is possible, and encourage others to take control of their finances.

If you've successfully overcome debt and are comfortable sharing your story on camera, please **comment below or DM me** with:
* Your name
* Age
* Short summary of your debt recovery journey
* Contact number

We can't wait to help you share your story and inspire others.

items.title:
Online | Starts next Tuesday and Wednesday Sept 1 & 2!

Learn a complete monologâ€¦
items.summary:
Online | Starts next Tuesday and Wednesday Sept 1 & 2!

Learn a complete monologue technique and finish with up to 4 pieces. You only need 1 picked out to start :) 

In this workshop you'll learn to . . . 

DIRECT your monologue with fun, specific staging. This reduces nerves, because your body knows what to do at each moment. 

ACT your monologue with truth and connection without a partner. 

AUDITION with your monologue: make confident, positive entrances and exits, and know what to do in all of the non-acting moments of an audition. 

Limited space open! Click the link below for a complete class description and how to apply.

items.title: Join our Dream Work Workshop, designed for actors, writers, directors, painters â€¦
items.summary:
Join our Dream Work Workshop, designed for actors, writers, directors, painters and artists ready to explore the unconscious landscape of their creativity. This transformative process moves beyond traditional technique, helping you access the raw, authentic parts of yourself to build more tender, complex, and grounded characters.

Through dream analysis, sense memory, and creative exploration, you will learn to: â€¢ Access the unconscious parts of yourself to better understand your roles. â€¢ Break through creative blocks, fear, and self-consciousness. â€¢ Own your part with a profound sense of truth and authenticity. â€¢ Use your entire lived experienceâ€”the light and the shadowâ€”to fuel your work from a place of strength.

This is is not about therapy; itâ€™s about building a powerful, sustainable toolkit to deepen your craft and set your performances free.

Ready to transform your process? www.schott-acting-studio.de [learn more and secure your spot. ](https://lnkd.in/dbMkQvE)

Hello, As part of an ambitious project (60-minute script adapted into 60 1-minute episodes for TikTok), we are looking for our **two main male roles**. We are specifically looking for actors who are** fluent in English or American English, with no foreign accents**.

**The themes covered** : Male love, Mafia, Manipulation, When love and hate intertwine

**The characters** :

Mitchell A high-ranking member of the Bloodhand Gang, Mitchell is a cunning and resilient figure in the mafia. Known for his decadent and reckless lifestyle, he is often referred to as "the playboy of the Bloodhand Gang." Coming from the slums, Mitchell has an insatiable thirst for power and is willing to endure slanderâ€”some even accuse him of selling his body to climb the ranks.

Julian A tortured soul, his childhood was tragic and tumultuous, marked by constant hardships. The natural heir to the Bloodhand Gang, he is groomed by his half-brother to take commands. Yet, deep down, his only reason for staying in the Gang is to be close to the one he considers his savior, Mitchell.

We are looking to create two "duos" that know each other (so each child has a friend they know on the shoot) - this can be brothers, sisters, friends, cousins, neighbours.. items.title:
Casting Call for Short Film â€“ â€œDisplacedâ€

Production Type: Short Film (Indie, nâ€¦
items.summary:
Casting Call for Short Film â€“ â€œDisplacedâ€

Production Type: Short Film (Indie, non-union, low-budget)
Location: Tulsa Metro, 
Oklahoma
Dates: Weekends in October 2025
Compensation: $100/day (no days over 8 hours)
Director: Raphael Pacheco

Synopsis:  In a labyrinthine urban sprawl, a lonely detective struggles to solve a murder while grappling with the disorientation of life in a new time and place. As he follows the trail of a vague suspect, his investigation descends into a dark odyssey of anxiety and madness. 

Casting Roles
The Detective â€“ Male Lead, 20sâ€“30s. Tough and gritty exterior, but inwardly sensitive and sorrowful. Brief action violence scene (experience preferred but not required).
The Chief â€“ Male Supporting, 40sâ€“60s. Hardened but friendly, a respectable figure.
Irons â€“ Male Supporting, 20sâ€“40s. A blunt, opinionated officer partnered with the Detective.
The Fatale â€“ Female Supporting, 30s. Mature, dignified, but manipulative. Scene requires shuffling cards (experience preferred but not required).
The Siren â€“ Female Supporting, 20s. Young companion to the Fatale, charming but irreverent.

To Submit
Email contact@pachecoprojects.com with the subject line: Displaced Audition â€“ [Desired Role]

Include:

Full Name (as you wish to be credited)

Age

Height

Relevant Special Skills (see preferences in role breakdowns)

Attach or link:

Resume

Headshot

Dramatic Monologue (self-tape, max 60 seconds)

Submission Deadline: September 13, 2025 (end of day).
Callbacks with script sides may be requested after that date.

Displaced is an abstract, black-and-white neo-noir in the tradition of surrealist cinema like David Lynchâ€™s Eraserhead, Orson Wellesâ€™ The Trial, or Charlie Kaufmanâ€™s Iâ€™m Thinking of Ending Things. If those films feel too weird or avant garde, this probably isnâ€™t for you (and thatâ€™s okay!). Displaced is written and directed by Raphael Pacheco, a seasoned producer of indie shorts and web series, in his first film since moving to Oklahoma. It will be a minimalistic production, with a small and versatile crew, shooting on a prosumer mirrorless camera, and the cast providing their own outfits (with exceptions for specialty costume/prop pieces required by the script). Expect a tight, intimate set with lots of creative and scrappy problem solving.

items.title:
The 4%: The Key to Your Acting Journey ğŸ­âœ¨
 
 Today I want to talk about a conceâ€¦
items.summary:
The 4%: The Key to Your Acting Journey ğŸ­âœ¨
 
 Today I want to talk about a concept that affects everyone on the planet but especially actors
 
 Itâ€™s actually a pretty startling statistic and a powerful concept, and it could literally redefine your acting journey
 
 Did you know that a staggering 96% of actors quit and change careers within the first four years of entering the industry
 
 Itâ€™s true
 
 Leaving only 4% who actually persevere and eventually find success
 
 When I first found this out, it left me with two immediate questions
 
 Why is this
 
 What sets the 96% apart from the 4%
 
 After a lot of study, my belief is
 
 It all comes down to a concept called "The Dip"
 
 Whatâ€™s The Dip
 
 "The Dip" is something we all encounter in our careersâ€”especially in acting
 
 Itâ€™s that moment when the initial excitement fades, and the reality of hard work, rejection, and competition sets in
 
 This is the make-or-break point, where enthusiasm wanes, and most people question their path
 
 The 96% give in to these doubts and challenges, but
 
 The remaining 4% push through
 
 So, what makes these few different ğŸ”¥
 
 Itâ€™s their unyielding determination and resilience
 
 While others see obstacles, they see opportunities
 
 They work tirelesslyâ€”early mornings, late nights, holidays
 
 These are the actors who practice even when theyâ€™re ill, tired, stressed, or busy
 
 They donâ€™t let todayâ€™s negativity delay tomorrowâ€™s dreams
 
 Hereâ€™s the good news
 
 Being part of that 4% is a choice
 
 Itâ€™s about deciding not to quit when it gets tough
 
 Itâ€™s about embracing "The Dip" as a part of your journey, instead of the end of it
 
 Because on the other side of perseverance
 
 Lies your success, your fulfillment, and the complete realization of your dreams
 
 Itâ€™s not just about becoming a great actor
 
 Itâ€™s about becoming a relentless pursuer of goals
 
 Embracing the journey and being a warrior against adversity
 
 So, to every actor reading this
 
 Ask yourself
 
 Are you ready to be part of the 4%
 
 Are you willing to be part of the 4%
 
 Are you prepared to push through "The Dip" to achieve your dreams
 
 If your answer is yes, then gear up for a journey of a lifetimeâ€”filled with growth, challenges, and triumphs
 
 And remember
 
 When it gets hardâ€”and it willâ€”remember that it will be worth it
 
 So stay strong, stay dedicated, and go transform those dreams into reality ğŸ’ª
 
 #ActingJourney #TheDip #Perseverance #DreamBig #ActorMindset #MasterYourCraft #MasterYourMind #MasterYourBusiness #StayStrong #ActorLife #NeverGiveUp #ActorsLife #PursueYourPassion #Resilience #ChaseYourDreams

Ich habe mir die besten Schauspielcoaches, Mindsetcoaches, Fotografen und Filmemacher gepackt, die ich kenne.

Hauptsache die richtige Energie, Motivation, Power.

Wir freuen uns auf eine kleine Gruppe mit besonderen Menschen.

Es wird legendÃ¤r ;-)
